  16. (* Infrastructure to support user-defined printers in toplevels and debugger *)

  18. ‌type printer_type = Types.type_expr -> Types.type_expr

  20. ‌let type_arrow ta tb =
  21.   Ctype.newty (Tarrow (Asttypes.Nolabel, ta, tb, Types.commu_var ()))

  23. ‌let type_formatter () =
  24.   let format = Path.Pident (Ident.create_persistent "Stdlib__Format") in
  25.   Ctype.newconstr (Path.Pdot(format, "formatter")) []

  27. ‌let type_unit = Predef.type_unit

  29. (*
  30.   type 'a printer_type_old = 'a -> unit
  31.   type 'a printer_type_new = Format.formatter -> 'a -> unit
  32. *)
  33. ‌let printer_type_old alpha =
  34.   type_arrow alpha type_unit

  36. ‌let printer_type_new alpha =
  37.   type_arrow (type_formatter ()) (type_arrow alpha type_unit)
